0101011001101111 0101001000101111 0 -> sum: 1010100010011110, cout: 0
0111111110111001 0000001111011010 0 -> sum: 1000001110010011, cout: 0
0110001001000011 1101111100100110 1 -> sum: 0100000101101010, cout: 1
1010000011100100 1010100110010110 0 -> sum: 0100101001111010, cout: 1
0101101101001011 0100001110011100 0 -> sum: 1001111011100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
